analysis.description:
EtheremonProcessor.cashOut (/unique_chucks/1/0x8a60806f05876f4d6db00c877b0558dbcad30682.sol#313-345) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(_amount) (/unique_chucks/1/0x8a60806f05876f4d6db00c877b0558dbcad30682.sol#336-342)
class in EtheremonProcessor.getMonsterClassBasic (/unique_chucks/1/0x8a60806f05876f4d6db00c877b0558dbcad30682.sol#353-354) is a local variable never initialiazed

EtheremonProcessor.getMonsterCP has external calls inside a loop:
